# smart

**Type Property**

A smart playlist includes items that match one or more user-specified rules.

## Declaration

```swift
static var smart: MPMediaPlaylistAttribute { get }
```

## Constants

- **onTheGo**: A playlist created on a device rather than synced from the Music app.
- **genius**: A Genius playlist includes items related to other items in your Music library.
